definition: stroke count (number of brushstrokes of a Chinese character)
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: She can even look at a line of characters and meanwhile read out their stroke numbers, just like reading a text.
sentences.chinese: 她甚至能像讀課文一樣流利讀出一排文字的筆畫數。

sentences.english: Am I not up-to-date or not correct on the number of strokes?
sentences.chinese: 我該不該更新和改正不正確的筆畫數呢？
